display_long_description:
# Welcome to The Pizza Shop Simulator VR! 
Get ready to dive into the chaotic world of pizza-making and turn your wacky pizza shop into the most popular spot in town! Here's how you can start making pizzas in this wild VR experience. Use wild tools like the Sauce Gun and BoomBox to spice up your shop, take orders, and earn cash to unlock upgrades. Groove to music while expanding your shop and unlocking even more chaotic fun!

**Sauce Gun Showdown**

You're in the heat of the kitchen — the customer wants extra sauce, and you're armed with the Sauce Gun. Blast sauces like you're cooking a masterpiece, all while keeping up with incoming orders.
[media]

**BoomBox Beats**

Cooking's better with music. With your new BoomBox, you can drop beats while spinning dough. Customers groove, toppings fly, and the kitchen turns into a full-blown pizza rave.

[media]

**Cheese Bomb Explosion**

Say goodbye to boring pizza toppings. Drop a Cheese Bomb, watch the mozzarella fly, and make your pizzas explode with flavor. It’s a mess — and a masterpiece.

[media]

**Purchase & Upgrade Station**

You earned some dough — now it’s time to shop. Head to your in-game upgrade station, buy crazy new gear, and take your pizza shop to the next level.


[media]
